snippet: Former Libyan rebels, some of whom have been accused of torturing detainees, still hold about three-quarters of the people they arrested during the country’s civil war, the United Nations said on Wednesday.
abstract: United Nations says that former Libyan rebels, some of whom have been accused of torturing detainees, still hold about three-quarters of the people they arrested during the country’s civil war.
lead_paragraph: Former Libyan rebels, some of whom have been accused of torturing detainees, still hold about three-quarters of the people they arrested during the country’s civil war, the United Nations said on Wednesday.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
